entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
